-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generic JSON serialization / deserialization
--   
--   A generic JSON serializer that converts fields to <a>snake_case</a>
--   and optionally strips the constructor name from fields, so that the
--   generated JSON is compatible with most web services.
--   
--   Have a look at <a>https://github.com/sol/json-fu#readme</a> for
--   examples.
@package json-fu
@version 0.1.0

module Data.JSON
fromJSON :: Data a => Value -> Maybe a
toJSON :: Data a => a -> ByteString
parseJSON :: ByteString -> Maybe Value
get :: Text -> Value -> Maybe Value
